Notes for Users of this document: Coding is more Phonetic in Baraha. special care – Baraha coding uses ‘e’ and ‘o’ (in Sanskrit) for sound E and O. we have used capital letters as it matches with Unicode/general conventions in this document. ~g is nasal of ka varga (gna) ~j is nasal of cha varga (jya) H is visargam Vedic/Swara symbols – q anudAttam, # swaritam, 
$ dheerga swaritam, & avagraha,  ~M nasal symbol ^^ symbol represents letters separately without joining them when conjunct consonants are formed. ushmAn codes s, S, Sha (saraswati, Sankar, puShpam) Confirm corrections given for TB 3.7-3.12 Sanskrit Books are incorporated. Kindly notify any major errors or inadvertent deletions to 
mail id- vedavms@gmail.com OM namaH paramAtmanE, SrI mahAgaNapatayE namaH SrI guruByO namaH, haqriqH OM 3.	kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya brAhmaNE tRutIyAShTakaM 3.7	taittirIya brAhmaNE tRutiyAShTakE saptamaH prapAThakaH acCidraM kANDaM prAyaScittEna mantraiSca yaj~jacCidrapUraNAdacCidramucyatE 3.7.1	anuvAkaM 1 - darSapUrNamAsEShTiviShayANi kAni citprAyaScittAni T.B.3.7.1.1 sarvAqnq. vA EqShO$&gnau kAmAqn pravE#Sayati | yO$-&gnIna#nvAqdhAya# vraqtamuqpaiti# | sa yadani#ShTvA prayAqyAt | akA#maprItA EnaqM kAmAq nAnuq prayA#yuH | aqtEqjA a#vIqrya#H syAt | sa ju#huyAt | tuByaqM tA a#~ggirastama | viSvA$H sukShiqtayaqH pRutha#k | agnEq kAmA#ya yEmiraq iti# | kAmA#nEqvAsmi#n dadhAti | 1 (10) T.B.3.7.1.2 kAma#prItA EnaqM kAmAq anuqprayA$nti |
tEqjaqsvI vIqryA#vAn Bavati || santa#tiqrvA EqShA yaqj~jasya# | yO$-&gnIna#nvAqdhAya# vraqtamuqpaiti# |
sa yaduqdvAya#ti | vicCi#tti-rEqvAsyaq sA || taM prA~jca#muqddhRutya# | manaqsOpa#tiShThEta | manOq vai praqjApa#tiH | prAqjAqpaqtyO yaqj~jaH | 2 (10) T.B.3.7.1.3

mana#saiqva yaqj~ja(gm) santa#nOti | BUrityA#ha | BUqtO vai praqjApa#tiH | BUti#mEqvOpai#ti || vi vA EqSha i#ndriqyENa# vIqryE#NarddhyatE | yasyA-hi#tAgnE-raqgnira#paqkShAya#ti | yAvaqcCamya#yA praqviddhyE$t | yadiq tAva#dapaqkShAyE$t | ta(gm) saMBa#rEt | 
iqdaM taq Eka#M paqra u#taq Eka$M | 3 (10) T.B.3.7.1.4 tRuqtIyE#naq jyOti#ShAq sam~Mvi#Sasva | saqm~MvESa#nastaqnuvaiq cAru#rEdhi | priqyE dEqvAnA$M paraqmE jaqnitraq iti# | brahma#Naiqvainaq(gm)q saMBa#rati | saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiH | yadi# parastaq-rAma#paqkShAyE$t | aqnuq praqyAyAva#syEt |

sO Eqva tataqH prAya#ScittiH || OSha#dhIqrvA Eqtasya# paqSUn payaqH pravi#Sati | yasya# haqviShE# vaqthsA aqpAkRu#tAq dhaya#nti | 4 (10) T.B.3.7.1.5 tAn. yadduqhyAt | yAqtayA$mnA haqviShA# yajEta | yanna duqhyAt | yaqj~jaqpaqru-raqntari#yAt | vAqyaqvyA$M ~MyavAqgUM nirva#pEt | vAqyurvai paya#saH pradApayiqtA | sa EqvAsmaiq payaqH pradA#payati | payOq vA OSha#dhayaH | payaqH paya#H | paya#saiqvAsmaiq payO&va#rundhE | 5 (10) T.B.3.7.1.6 athOtta#rasmai haqviShE# vaqthsAnaqpA ku#ryAt |

saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiH || aqnyaqtaqrAn. vA EqSha dEqvAn BA#gaqdhEyE#naq vya#rddhayati | yE yaja#mAnasya sAqyaM gRuqhamAq-gacCa#nti | yasya# sAyaM duqgdha(gm) haqvirArti#-mAqrcCati# | indrA#ya vrIqhInniq-rupyO-pa#vasEt | payOq vA OSha#dhayaH | paya# EqvAraBya# gRuhIqtvO-pa#vasati | yatprAqtaH syAt | tacCRuqtaM ku#ryAt | 6 (10) T.B.3.7.1.7 athEta#ra aiqndraH pu#rOqDASa#H syAt | iqndriqyE EqvAsmai# saqmIcI# dadhAti | payOq vA OSha#dhayaH | payaqH paya#H | paya#saiqvAsmaiq payO&va#rundhE | athOtta#rasmai haqviShE# vaqthsAnaqpA ku#ryAt |

saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiH || uqBayAqnq. vA EqSha dEqvAn BA#gaqdhEyE#naq vya#rddhayati | yE yaja#mAnasya sAqyaM ca# prAqtaSca# gRuqhamAq-gacCa#nti | yasyOqBaya(gm)# haqvirArtti#-mAqrcCati# | 7 (10) T.B.3.7.1.8 aiqndraM pa~jca#SarAva-mOdaqnaM nirva#pEt | aqgniM dEqvatA#nAM prathaqmaM ~Mya#jEt | aqgnimu#KA Eqva dEqvatA$H prINAti | aqgniM ~MvA anvaqnyA dEqvatA$H | indraqmanvaqnyAH | tA EqvOBayI$H prINAti | payOq vA OSha#dhayaH | payaqH paya#H | paya#saiqvAsmaiq payO&va#rundhE | athOtta#rasmai haqviShE# vaqthsAnaqpA ku#ryAt | 8 (10) T.B.3.7.1.9

saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiH || aqrddhO vA Eqtasya# yaqj~jasya# mIyatE | yasyaq vratyE&haqn patnya#nA-lamBuqkA Bava#ti | tAma#paqruddhya# yajEta | sarvE#Naiqva yaqj~jEna# yajatE | tAmiqShTvO-pa#hvayEta | amUqhama#smi | sA tvaM | dyauraqhaM | pRuqthiqvI tvaM ( ) | sAmAqhaM | RuktvaM | tAvEhiq saMBa#vAva | saqha rEtO# dadhAvahai | puq(gm)qsE puqtrAyaq vEtta#vai | rAqyaspOShA#ya suprajAqstvAya# suqvIryAqyEti# | aqrddha EqvainAqmu-pa#hvayatE |

saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiH || 9 (18) (daqdhAqtiq - yaqj~ja - u#taq EkaqM - dhaya#nti - rundhE - kuryA - dAqrCa - tyaqpAku#ryAt - pRuthiqvI tvamaqShTau ca#) (A1) special kOrvai (sarvAqnq. vi vai yadi# parastaqrAmOSha#dhIran yataqrAnuqBayA#naqrdhO vai ) 3.7.2	anuvAkaM 2 -agnihOtrasAmnAyyasAdhAraNAni prAyaScittAni 3.7.2.1 yadviH Sha#NNEna juhuqyAt | apra#jA apaqSuryaja#mAnaH syAt | yadanA#yatanE niqnayE$t | aqnAqyaqtaqna-ssyA$t | prAqjAqpaqtyayaqrcA va#lmIka-vaqpAyAqma-va#nayEt | prAqjAqpaqtyO vai vaqlmIka#H | yaqj~jaH praqjApa#tiH | praqjApa#tAvEqva yaqj~jaM prati#ShThApayati | BUrityA#ha | BUqtO vai praqjApa#tiH | 10 (10) T.B.3.7.2.2

BUti#mEqvOpai#ti | tat kRuqtvA | aqnyAM duqgdhvA puna#r. hOtaqvya$M | saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiH || yatkIqTA-va#pannEna juhuqyAt | apra#jA apaqSu-ryaja#mAnaH syAt | yadanA#yatanE niqnayE$t | aqnAqyaqtaqnaH syA$t | maqddhyaqmEna# paqrNEna# dyAvA-pRuthiqvya#-yaqrcA&nta#H pariqdhi nina#yEt | dyAvA#pRuthiqvyO-rEqvainaqt-prati#ShThApayati | 11 (10) T.B.3.7.2.3

tatkRuqtvA | aqnyAM duqgdhvA puna#r. hOtaqvya$M | saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiH || yadava#vRuShTEna juhuqyAt | apa#rUpa-masyAqtma-~jjA#yEta | kiqlAsO# vAq syAda#r.SaqsO vA$ | yat pratyEqyAt | yaqj~jaM ~MvicCi#ndyAt | sa ju#huyAt | miqtrO janA$n kalpayati prajAqnann | 12 (10) T.B.3.7.2.4 miqtrO dA#dhAra pRuthiqvImuqta dyAM | miqtraH kRuqShTIra-ni#miShAq &Bica#ShTE | saqtyAya# haqvyaM GRuqtava#-jjuhOqtEti# | miqtrENaiqvaina#t kalpayati | tatkRuqtvA | aqnyAM duqgdhvA puna#r.hOtaqvya$M |

saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiH || yat pUrva#syAq-mAhu#tyA(gm) huqtAyAq-muttaqrA-&&hu#tiqH skandE$t | dviqpAdBi#H paqSuBiq-ryaja#mAnOq vyRu##ddhyEta | yadutta#rayAq &Biju#huqyAt | 13 (10) T.B.3.7.2.5 catu#ShpAdBiH paqSuBiq-ryaja#mAnOq vyRu#ddhyEta | yatraq vEttha# vanaspatE dEqvAnAqM guhyAq nAmA#ni | tatra# haqvyAni# gAmaqyEti# vAnaspaqtya-yaqrcA saqmidha#-mAqdhAya# | tUqShNImEqva puna#-rjuhuyAt |

vanaqspati#naiqva yaqj~jasyArtAqM cAnA$rtAqM cAhu#tIq vidA#dhAra | tatkRuqtvA | aqnyAM duqgdhvA puna#r. hOtaqvya$M | saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiH || yatpuqrA pra#yAqjEByaqH prA~ga~ggA#raqH skandE$t | aqddhvaqryavE# caq yaja#mAnAyaq cAka(gg)# syAt | 14 (10) T.B.3.7.2.6 yad da#kShiqNA | braqhmaNE# caq yaja#mAnAyaq cAka(gg)# syAt | yat praqtyak | 
hOtrE# caq patni#yai caq yaja#mAnAyaq cAka(gg)# syAt | yaduda~g# | aqgnIdhE# ca paqSuBya#Scaq yaja#mAnAyaq cAka(gg)# syAt | yada#BijuhuqyAt | ruqdrO$&sya paqSUn GAtu#kaH syAt |

yannABi# juhuqyAt | aSA$ntaqH prahri#yEta || 15 (10) T.B.3.7.2.7 sruqvasyaq buddhnE#nABiq nida#ddhyAt | mA ta#mOq mA yaqj~jasta#maqnmA yaja#mAna-stamat | nama#stE astvAyaqtE | namO# rudra parAyaqtE | 
namOq yatra# niqShIda#si |

aqmuM mA hi(gm)#sIraqmuM mA hi(gm)#sIqritiq yEnaq skandE$t || taM praha#rEt | saqhasra#SRu~ggO vRuShaqBO jAqtavE#dAH | stOma#pRuShThO GRuqtavA$n-thsuqpratI#kaH | mA nO# hAsInmEtthiqtO (hAsIrmEtthiqtO) nEttvAq jahA#ma ( ) | gOqpOqShaM nO# vIrapOqShaM ca# yaqcCEti# |

brahma#NaiqvainaqM praha#rati | saiva tataqH prAya#ScittiH || 16 (13) (vai praqjApa#tiH - sthApayati - prajAqnan - naqBiju#huqyAth - syA$d - dhriyEtaq - jahA#maq triNi# ca) (A2) special kOrvai (yadviHSha#NNEna prAjApaqtyayAq yat kIqTA ma#ddhyaqmEnaq yadava#vRuShTEnaq yat pUrva#syAqM ~Myat puqrA pra#yAqjEByaq pra~g~ggA#rOq yad da#kShiqNA yat praqtyagyaduda~g~g#) 3.7.3	anuvAkaM 3 -muKyAgnyasaMBavE&nukalpAH hOmAdhArAH T.B.3.7.3.1 vi vA EqSha i#ndriqyENa# vIqryE#NarddhyatE | yasyA-hi#tAgnE-raqgni-rmaqthyamA#nOq na jAya#tE | yatrAqnyaM paSyE$t | tata# AqhRutya# hOtaqvya$M |

aqgnA-vEqvAsyA$-gnihOqtra(gm) huqtaM Ba#vati || yadyaqnyaM na viqndEt | aqjAyA(gm)# hOtaqvya$M | AqgnEqyI vA EqShA | yadaqjA | aqgnA-vEqvAsyA$-gnihOqtra(gm) huqtaM Ba#vati | 17 (10) T.B.3.7.3.2 aqjasyaq tu nAS~jI#yAt | yadaqjasyA$-S~jIqyAt |

yAmEqvAgnA-vAhu#tiM juhuqyAt | tAma#dyAt | tasmA#daqjasyaq nASya$M || yadyaqjAM na viqndEt | brAqhmaqNasyaq dakShi#NEq hastE# hOtaqvya$M | EqSha vA aqgni rvai$SvAnaqraH | yadbrA$hmaqNaH | aqgnA-vEqvAsyA$-gnihOqtra(gm) huqtaM Ba#vati | 18 (10) T.B.3.7.3.3 brAqhmaqNaM tu va#saqtyai# nApa#rundhyAt | yadbrA$hmaqNaM ~Mva#saqtyA a#paruqndhyAt | yasmi#nnEq-vAgnAvAhu#tiM juhuqyAt | taM BA#gaqdhEyE#naq vya#rddhayEt |

tasmA$d brAhmaqNO va#saqtyai# nApaqruddhya#H || yadi# brAhmaqNaM na viqndEt | daqrBaqstaqbEM hO#taqvya$M | aqgniqvAn. vai da#rBastaqbaMH | aqgnAvEq-vAsyA$-gnihOqtra(gm) huqtaM Ba#vati | daqrBA(gg)stu nAddhyA#sIta | 19 (10) T.B.3.7.3.4 yaddaqrBAnaqddhyAsI#ta | yAmEqvAgnA-vAhu#tiM juhuqyAt | tAmaddhyA#sIta |

tasmA$d daqrBA nAddhyA#sitaqvyA$H || yadi# daqrBAnna viqndEt | aqPsu hO#taqvya$M | ApOq vai sarvA# dEqvatA$H | dEqvatA$svEq vAsyA$-gnihOqtra(gm) huqtaM Ba#vati | Apaqstu na pari#cakShIta | yadApa#H pariqcakShI#ta | 20 (10) T.B.3.7.3.5 yA mEqvAPsvAhu#tiM juhuqyAt | tAM pari#cakShIta |

tasmAqdApOq na pa#riqcakShyA$H || mEddhyA# caq vA EqtasyA#mEqddhyA ca# taqnuvauq sa(gm)sRu#jyEtE | yasyA-hi#tAgnE-raqnyairaqgniBi#-raqgnaya#H sa(gm)sRuqjyantE$ | aqgnayEq vivi#cayE purOqDASa#-maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEt |
mEddhyA$M caiqvAsyA#-mEqddhyAM ca# taqnuvauq vyAva#rtayati || aqgnayE$ vraqtapa#tayE purOqDASa#-maqShTAka#pAlaqM nirva#pEt | aqgnimEqva vraqtapa#tiq(gg)q svEna# BAgaqdhEyEq-nOpa#dhAvati |
sa Eqvaina#M ~MvraqtamA-la#BaMyati || 21 (10) T.B.3.7.3.6

garBaq(gg)q srava#ntamagaqdama#kaH | aqgni-rindraq-stvaShTAq bRuhaqspati#H | pRuqthiqvyA-mava#cuScO-taiqtat | nABi-prApnO#tiq nir.Ru#tiM parAqcaiH || rEtOq vA EqtadvAji#naq-mAhi#tAgnEH | yada#gnihOqtraM | tadyathsravE$t | rEtO$&syaq vAji#na(gg) sravEt | garBaq(gg)q srava#ntama-gaqdama#kaq-rityA#ha |

rEta# EqvAsmiqn vAji#naM dadhAti || 22 (10) T.B.3.7.3.7 aqgnirityA#ha | aqgnirvai rE#tOqdhAH | rEta# Eqva tadda#dhAti | indraq ityA#ha | iqndriqya-mEqvAsmi#n-dadhAti | tvaShTEtyA#ha | tvaShTAq vai pa#SUqnAM mi#thuqnAnA(gm)# rUpaqkRut | rUqpamaqva paqSuShu# dadhAti | bRuhaqspatiqrityA#ha |
brahmaq vai dEqvAnAqM bRuhaqspati#H ( ) | brahma#NaiqvAsmai$ praqjAH praja#nayati || pRuqthiqvyA-mava#cuScOtaiqta-dityA#ha |
aqsyA-mEqvainaqt prati#ShThApayati || nABi prApnO#tiq nir.Ru#tiM parAqcairityA#ha |

rakSha#sAqmapa#hatyai || 23 (15) (aqjA&gnAvEqvAsyA$gnihOqtra(gm) huqtaM Ba#vati - Bava - tyAsIta - pariqcakShI#ta - lamBayati - dadhAti - dEqvAnAqM bRuhaqspatiqH pa~jca# ca) (A3) special kOrvai (vi vai yad yaqnyamaqjAyA$M brAhmaqNasya# darBastaqmbE$&Psu hO#taqvya$m) 3.7.4	anuvAkaM 4 -aiShTikayAjamAnamantrAH T.B.3.7.4.1
yAH puqrastA$t praqsrava#nti | uqpari#ShTAth saqrvata#Scaq yAH | tABI# raqSmipa#vitrABiH | SraqddhAM ~Myaqj~jamAra#BE || dEvA# gAtuvidaH |
gAqtuM ~Myaqj~jAya# vindata | mana#saqspati#nA dEqvEna# | vAtA$d-yaqj~jaH prayu#jyatAM || tRuqtIya#syai diqvaH | gAqyaqtriqyA sOmaq ABRu#taH | 24 (10) T.B.3.7.4.2

sOqmaqpIqthAyaq saMna#yituM | vaka#laq-manta#raqmAda#dE || ApO# dEvIH SuqddhAH stha# | iqmA pAtrA#Ni Sundhata | uqpAqtaq~gkyA#ya dEqvAnA$M | paqrNaqvaqlkamuqta Su#ndhata || payO# gRuqhEShuq payO# aGniqyAsu# |

payO# vaqthsEShuq payaq indrA#ya haqviShE$ dhriyasva | gAqyaqtrI pa#rNavaqlkEna# | payaH sOma#M karOtviqmaM || 25 (10) T.B.3.7.4.3 aqgniM gRu#hNAmi suqrathaqM ~MyO ma#yOq BUH | ya uqdyanta#mAq rOha#tiq sUryaqmahnE$ | AqdiqtyaM jyOti#ShAqM jyOti#ruttaqmaM |
SvO yaqj~jAya# ramatAM dEqvatA$ByaH ||

vasU$n ruqdrAnA#diqtyAn | indrE#Na saqha dEqvatA$H | tAH pUrvaqH pari#gRuhNAmi | sva Aqyata#nE manIqShayA$ || iqmAmUrja#M pa~jcadaqSIM ~MyE pravi#ShTAH | tAndEqvAn pari#gRuhNAmiq pUrva#H | 26 (10) T.B.3.7.4.4 aqgnir. ha#vyaqvADiqha tAnAva#hatu | pauqrNaqmAqsa(gm) haqviriqdamE#ShAqM mayi# |
AqmAqvAqsya(gm)# haqviriqdamE#ShAqM mayi# || aqntaqrA&gnI paqSava#H | dEqvaqsaq(gm)q sadaqmAga#mann | tAn pUrvaqH pari#gRuhNAmi |
sva Aqyata#nE manIqShayA$ || iqha praqjA viqSvarU#pA ramantAM | aqgniM gRuqhapa#timaqBi saqm~MvasA#nAH | tAH pUrvaqH pari#gRuhNAmi | 27 (10) T.B.3.7.4.5
sva Aqyata#nE manIqShayA$ || iqha paqSavO# viqSvarU#pA ramantAM | aqgniM gRuqhapa#timaqBi saqm~MvasA#nAH |
tAn pUrvaqH pari#gRuhNAmi | sva Aqyata#nE manIqShayA$ || aqyaM pi#tRuqNAmaqgniH |
avA$DDhaqvyA piqtRuByaq A | taM pUrvaqH pari#gRuhNAmi | avi#ShaM naH piqtuM ka#rat || aja#sraqM tvA(gm) sa#BApAqlAH | 28 (10) T.B.3.7.4.6

viqjaqyaBA#gaq(gm)q sami#ndhatAM | agnE# dIqdAya# mE saBya | viji#tyai Saqrada#H SaqtaM || anna#mAvasaqthIya$M | aqBiha#rANi Saqrada#H SaqtaM | AqvaqsaqthE SriyaqM mantra$M | ahi#rbuqddhniyOq niya#cCatu || iqdamaqha-maqgni jyE$ShThEByaH | vasu#ByO yaqj~jaM prabra#vImi | iqdamaqha-mindra# jyEShThEByaH | 29 (10) T.B.3.7.4.7
ruqdrEByO# yaqj~jaM prabra#vImi | iqdamaqhaM ~Mvaru#Na-jyEShThEByaH | AqdiqtyEByO# yaqj~jaM prabra#vImi || paya#svatIq-rOSha#dhayaH |

paya#svadvIqrudhAqM paya#H | aqpAM paya#sOq yatpaya#H | tEnaq mAmi#ndraq sa(gm)sRu#ja || agnE$ vratapatE vraqtaM ca#riShyAmi | tacCa#kEyaqM tanmE# rAddhyatAM | vAyO$ vratapataq Adi#tya vratapatE | 30 (10) T.B.3.7.4.8
vraqtAnA$M ~MvratapatE vraqtaM ca#riShyAmi | tacCa#kEyaqM tanmE# rAddhyatAM || iqmAM prAcIqmudI#cIM | iShaqmUrja#maqBi sa(gg)skRu#tAM | baqhuqpaqrNAmaSu#ShkAgrAM |
harA#mi paSuqpAmaqhaM || yatkRuShNO# rUqpaM kRuqtvA | prAvi#SaqstvaM ~MvanaqspatIn# |
tataqstvAmE#kavi(gm)SatiqdhA | saMBa#rAmi susaqMBRutA$ || 31 (10) T.B.3.7.4.9 trIn pa#riqdhI(gg)stiqsraH saqmidha#H | yaqj~jAyu#ranusaMcaqrAn |

uqpaqvEqShaM mEkSha#NaqM dhRuShTi$M | saMBa#rAmi susaqBRuMtA$ || yA jAqtA OSha#dhayaH | dEqvEBya# striyuqgaM puqrA | tAsAqM parva# rAddhyAsaM | paqriqstaqra-mAqharann# || aqpAM mEddhya#M ~Myaqj~jiya$M | sadE#va(gm) Siqvama#stu mE | 32 (10) T.B.3.7.4.10
